hooks.prompt:
Check if in this conversation any of these happened and whether follow-up actions were missed:

1. **Agent analysis or demo work**: wrote to docs/<agent>.md, created/modified demos → check agents.yaml status updated (pending→in-progress→done), check `npm run progress` was run, check demos/<agent>/README.md overview updated.

2. **Structural changes to the project itself**: added/removed npm scripts (package.json), added/removed skills (.claude/skills/), added/removed hooks (.claude/hooks/), changed conventions or workflow → check whether CLAUDE.md sections (项目结构, 常用命令, 自动化) were updated to reflect the changes.

If any follow-up was missed, respond {"ok": false, "reason": "<what needs to be done>"}. Otherwise respond {"ok": true}.
